description:
About Basic Microsoft PowerPoint 2016

This course on PowerPoint will teach you all the tactics to become a pro in making any kind of presentations. By doing this course you will learn a lot of thing about how to give the best presentations you must have ever given. You will learn to make great professional and animated PowerPoint presentations. The course teaches you in depth basics of PowerPoint tools which you would have never thought will be so helpful in making great presentations. In this course you will also learn great animation techniques which will help you make no. 1 presentations be it a business related or for training purpose. It is a very user friendly program and you will surely enjoy learning this.

Some of the features of PowerPoint:
  • Understanding the backstage of PowerPoint
  • Design templates and numerous fonts and editing techniques.
  • Different transition and animation styles.
  • Putting and editing pictures
  • Smart art and diagrams, etc.

About Advanced Microsoft PowerPoint 2016

The course teaches you advance (higher level) of PowerPoint tools. In this course you will also learn great animation techniques which will help you make no. 1 presentations be it a business related or for training purpose. It is a very user friendly program and you will surely enjoy learning this.

Some of the features of PowerPoint:
  • Create 3D Pictures & Effects
  • Various animation styles
  • Advanced Techniques
  • Smart art and diagrams, etc.
title: Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2016 Basic and Advanced
